method.name: SaveAsInVPM
method.abstract: SaveAs of a document in ENOVIAvpm V4 .

method.name: SetPDMProperties
method.abstract: Set the PDM properties of a document for ENOVIAvpm V4.

function.name: CATAddCBToCurrentEditor
function.abstract: Subscribe to CallBack on editor so that highlight in PSN works on batch.

function.name: CATCloseAssemblyInVPM
function.abstract: Closes a configured assembly open within ENOVIAvpm V4.

function.name: CATCommitVPM
function.abstract: Commit in VPM.

function.name: CATCompleteSessionFromVPM
function.abstract: Loads applicative objects from ENOVIAvpm V4 to complete the current session.

function.name: CATComputeDocId
function.abstract: Creates a DocId for a ENOVIAvpm V4 document.

function.name: CATConnectToVPM
function.abstract: Connects a user to the ENOVIAvpm V4 database.

function.name: CATCreateVPMProductStructure
function.abstract: Creates a Product Structure from an assembly stored in Structure Exploded mode in ENOVIAvpm V4.

function.name: CATCreateVPMSession
function.abstract: Creates an empty CATProduct dedicated to ENOVIAvpm V4 import.

function.name: CATCreateVPMSession
function.abstract: Creates an empty CATProduct dedicated to ENOVIAvpm import.

function.name: CATDisconnectFromVPM
function.abstract: Disconnects the application from ENOVIAvpm V4.

function.name: CATGetVPMEnvironment
function.abstract: Returns the ENOVIAvpm V4 environment name of a document.

function.name: CATInitBatch
function.abstract: Initializes the V5 session to communicate with ENOVIAvpm V4.

function.name: CATInitBatchOnHost
function.abstract:
Initialize the V5 session to communicate with an ENOVIAvpm V4 server
Role:This method initializes the CATIA V5 session and establishes the connection with ENOVIAvpm V4 running on a dedicated Unix host.

function.name: CATLoadChildrenFromVPM
function.abstract: Loads children of a product coming from ENOVIAvpm V4 database.

function.name: CATLoadDocumentFromVPM
function.abstract: Loads in session a document stored in an ENOVIAvpm V4 database.

function.name: CATLoadDocumentFromVPM
function.abstract: Loads in session a document stored in an ENOVIAvpm V4 database.

function.name: CATLoadFromVPM
function.abstract: Loads VPM objects into a new or existing product structure.

function.name: CATOpenConfiguredAssemblyInVPM
function.abstract: Opens a Structure Exploded assembly within ENOVIAvpm V4.

function.name: CATOpenConfiguredAssemblyInVPM
function.abstract: Opens a Structure Exploded assembly within ENOVIAvpm V4.

function.name: CATRebuildAssemblyFromDstDocument
function.abstract: Rebuilds a CATProduct from a downstream document refering to an assembly stored in the ENOVIAvpm V4 database.

function.name: CATSaveInVPM
function.abstract: Saves a sorted list of CATIA Object in ENOVIAvpm V4 database.

function.name: CATSaveInVPMFromCATIA
function.abstract: Saves a document and all its pointed documents in ENOVIAvpm V4 database.

function.name: CATSaveInVPMFromCATIA
function.abstract: Saves a document in session and all its pointed documents in ENOVIAvpm V4 database.

function.name: CATTerminateBatch
function.abstract: Terminates the VPM session.

function.name: CATValuatePdmId
function.abstract: Valuates the ENOVIAvpm V4 DocID of a document in session.

function.name: CATValuatePdmId
function.abstract: Valuates the ENOVIAvpm V4 DocID of a document in session.

function.name: ExecuteOnServer
function.abstract: Executes a User Exit on ENOVIAvpm V4.

function.name: GetObjectToSaveSortedList
function.abstract: Retrieves the sorted list of object of what need to be saved.

function.name: OpenAPSNGraph
function.abstract: Opens a product structure from a PSN file.

function.name: OpenAPSNGraphWithClause
function.abstract: Opens a product structure from a PSN file.
